extendedInfo.description: This great Live Wallpaper is the one for simulating perfectly a HD LED LIGHT PARTY EQUALIZER, plus it fits perfect on any screen and it is HD 1080P excellent graphics, for you to have a great time in a party, loud music or anywhere HD PARTY EQUALIZER LIVE WALLPAPER, set the size of your screen , preferably big, and thats it, you can even set the rythm of the song (fps)!!Guarantee it will NOT force close on ANY device!

reviews.title: Totally wack!!
reviews.comment: Absolutely no settings for color or anything beyond fps & small,medium or large screen size but it is extremely small on the Galaxy Nexus even with the largest size set.I would consider putting a lot more work into this before you charge money!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
